Ad.Title: Talking Pets 2 is a Runaway Hit
Ad.BrandClickThrough: http://www.universal.com Recent reviews have been surprisingly good Recent reviews of the family comedy Talking Pets 2: Off The Leash have been surprisingly good, say various newspapers. After Talking Pets 1: On The Leash performed well at the box office but poorly with critics, director Jon Van Beerhoven really pulled out all the stops. "I went 100% CG on this one.
